title: Sphere Slice
description: A slice of an implicit sphere. Defines the subsection of the sphere that the implicit volume actually occupies.

minRadius.description: The start of the slice along the radius of the sphere.

maxRadius.description: The end of the slice along the radius of the sphere.

minAngle.description: The start of the slice across the angles of the sphere, given in radians. The first element corresponds to the azimuthal angle (a.k.a longitude) and must be in the range [-pi, pi]. The second element corresponds to the polar angle (a.k.a. latitude) and must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].

maxAngle.description: The end of the slice across the angles of the sphere, in radians. The first element corresponds to the azimuthal angle (a.k.a longitude) and must be in the range [-pi, pi]. The second element corresponds to the polar angle (a.k.a. latitude) and must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].
